Answer
ESRS E3 paragraph 28 requires the disclosure of water consumption related to own operations
and related contextual information. It is expected that all sites and their contextual information
are considered in the materiality assessment. The disclosures on water consumption and
contextual information shall be reported for the entire group and can be aggregated for all or for
multiple sites.
